v0Prompt: Create a professional Matrix-themed landing page for ClaudeHydra - an AI orchestration platform. Use dark green theme (#0a1f0a) with neon green accents (#00ff41). Include: 1) Hero section with headline 'Orchestrate AI with Precision', animated gradient background. 2) 6-stage pipeline visualization as a horizontal flowchart (Speculate > Plan > Execute > Validate > Synthesize > Output) with icons. 3) Features grid with 6 cards. 4) Agent showcase section with 4 highlighted agents (Geralt, Yennefer, Dijkstra, Vesemir) in glowing avatar cards. 5) Tech stack badges section. 6) Code snippet showing MCP server initialization. Use JetBrains Mono for code, Inter for body. Glassmorphism cards with subtle glow effects. Responsive design.
